description: Kaila Haines found herself stuck in Milan due to Italy's efforts to contain the coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: 'Italy lockdown cut me off from my husband'
title_page: Coronavirus: 'Italy lockdown cut me off from my husband' - BBC News
maintext: Most of the bars have tables outside and I could see they had distanced the tables, so there are less tables than there used to be. There were people having their coffee on the sidewalk at their little cafe, so it was very relaxed.
